name: Fujiro
address: 8A/8B1 Thái Văn Lung, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best Tonkatsu in town hands down. This resides in the Japan Town on Thai Van Lung. This restaurants offer a variety of rice dish with fried assortments, such as tonkatsu (fried pork cutlet), tempura, tamago, etc. Their tonkatsu don is the best as everything is seasoned perfectly and the tonkatsu is huge, which is a bargain for the money.

name: Micro Boulangerie
address: 25 Đường Số 38, Thảo Điền, Quận 2, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best bread in town hands down. Freshly baked baguette, sourdough, and all types of pastry are in stock everyday. The bread is always warm and crispy every time you walked in. The perfect company for a late afternoon cheeseboard and wine.

name: Eddie's New York Deli & Diner
address: 71 Đ. Thảo Điền, Thảo Điền, Thành Phố Thủ Đức, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best American food in town hands down. There is nothing American that you cannot find here, even Asian American food. It's like they have brought the whole American atmosphere to Vietnam with the restaurant alone. The decor resembles the diner in the states. A wonderful atmosphere. And their milkshake is to die for!

name: Danbo
address: 7b1 Thái Văn Lung, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best ramen in town hands down. The broth is flavorful and rich. The place only serve tonkotsu ramen but they get it right. There is not one flaw about the bowls of ramen they bring out to the customers. Although, you should choose the lesser saltiness option for the broths since I think the normal option might be a bit salty for some people.

name: Bonchon Chicken
address: 43 Lý Tự Trọng, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best Korean fried chicken in town hands down. This place get down to point. There is no gimmicky sauce. They only do standard Korean fried chicken, where the chicken and batter is seasoned just right, giving the chicken the perfect crispy outer layer while having a juicy inside. Pair it with a nice cold beer and you will have the best time of your life.

name: Maguro
address: 8A/8B1 Thái Văn Lung, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best omakase in town hands down. Amazingly fresh products and the delivery is impeccable. Every dish has its own accent. It's not only a piece of raw fish on a dish but every piece of food comes with a hint of the expertise of the cook. The atmosphere is also quite nice. The price is reasonable for the amazing dishes you are given.

name: P'ti Saigon
address: 52 Ngô Quang Huy, Thảo Điền, Thành Phố Thủ Đức, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The one of best fine-dining for the price in town hands down. In a way, this place is not a fine-dining restaurant. But the dish that are in the menu say otherwise. Every dish is quite complicated and delicious. The restaurant focus mainly on Western food but comes with a hint of fusion of different cuisines as well.

name: Tomatito
address: 171 Calmette, Phường Nguyễn Thái Bình, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 712290, Vietnam
description: The best Spanish food in town hands down. There is no Spanish place in town can compete with Tomatito when it comes to price and quality. Everything is authentic and delicious. The paella is an absolute banger.

name: Quince
address: 37bis Đ. Ký Con, Phường Nguyễn Thái Bình, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best overall high-end food in town hands down. The ambience of this place is quite nice- open kitchen, rustic decoration, with dim light. The food is very intricate and there are some dish that are not offered any elsewhere. Definitely a must try. Perfect for a fancy date with your significant other or a nice family dinner.

name: Sol Kitchen & Bar
address: 115 Lý Tự Trọng, Phường Bến Thành, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best Mexican-fusion food in town hands down. Not the most authentic Mexican spot in town but everything is done very well. The fusion of Asian with Mexican is quite nice. You still can get tacos, ceviche, etc. and they are quite delicious aswell. Just don't expect pure Mexican taste.

name: Kiyota
address: 53 Phạm Viết Chánh, P. 19, Q. Bình Thạnh, Tp. Hồ Chí Minh, phường 19, Bình Thạnh, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best omakase for the price in town hands down. With only about 1 mill VND, you can get yourself a spot in this omakase. The quality is very good for what you've paid for. Everything is fresh and wonderfully made. The best money you can spend in my opinion. Remember to make reservation since this place is quite popular.

name: CTY Kitchen + Bar
address: Ground Floor & Behind the elevator lobby, 72-74 Nguyen Thi Minh Khai or Alleyway, 145 Hai Bà Trưng, Quận 3, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best modern office food in town hands down. Located in an office building, it is quite hard to find. Otherwise, everything is great about this spot. The food and drink are very good. Although it's meant for office worker, but the price is quite high compared to the regular office food spot. However, what you paid for is worth it since the portion is rather big and the food and drink are fantastic. The atmosphere is quite nice too since it's semi-outdoor.

name: Stoker
address: 44 Mạc Thị Bưởi, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best Western food for the price in town hands down. For about 600k, you can get yourself a lunch comprised of an appetizer, a main dish- usually squid, duck breast, or steak, and coffee/tea. Other than the amazingly cheap lunch menu, the food here is also amazing with a rather reasonable price. They offer dry-aged steak if you are into that.

name: Arirang
address: Q1, 3rd Floor, 2 Đồng Khởi, Bến Nghé, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The best Korean food in town hands down. This place is somewhat a hidden gem in my opinion. It's that crowded even on weekend. However, the food is so good here. The meat is fresh and of high-quality. The dish is authentic. There is a wide variety of dish you can try. I have not had a dish I don't like here.

name: Yu Shang Lou
address: 975 Đ. Trần Hưng Đạo, Phường 5, Quận 5, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh 72720, Vietnam
description: The best dimsum in town hands down. Quite far away from the center of the city but I think it is worth the trip. I think here is authentic Chinese food. There is no other dimsum in town that has this rich and flavorful Chinese taste. Can get quite loud since there are a lot of gatherings here. So if you are one who prefer lavish and quite dimsum, not the spot for you.
